name: Sergata
tag_list: rd-outsourcing, software-development, mobile-application-development, ios-ipad-android-application-development, entrepreneurs-competition, real-time-video-processing, technological-research, certified-aws-solution-provider
overview:
Sergata develops innovative technologies for hi-tech companies and startups attempting to establish new niches in their business, as well as entrepreneurs, with emphasis on web environment, video field and mobile applications.

The company was founded in 2006 with the goal of enabling its customers to develop technological ventures and realize the vast innovative potential of the online sphere in the smartest and most effective manner.

——————————————————————————–

Expertise and Services:

  • Specification and Development of complex web-based systems
  • Web 2.0 and Mobile applications development
  • Client/Server based video systems and real time video processing using advanced technologies
  • Technological research and consulting services
